author: Ove
content:
Yes, I quite agree with you on their business model. I'm a mac user since 1990 and remember very well how much discussions there were those days, how they locked their software to their hardware and didn't let any third party hardware suppliers in. But, at least, third party vendors of application software were at least free to develop for that platform. They still are. It's the mobile platforms and the businesses around this. It's another world.

Btw, we had our last Summer day last Sunday. It's surprising how similar weather has been all over Europe, this season.
